page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up at 7:30am and have Rice Crispies with milk and a cup of tea. School starts at 9am.It takes me ten minutes to walk.We do reading,writing, and sums.I have sandwiches for dinner with crisps and an orange.My friend has a school dinner;chips,beef burger and icecream.We do Art & Craft and Science.After school I play on my bike.(Written by an 8 year old.) After my breakfast of toast and marmite I put my hair in a pigtail, clean my teeth and walk to school.I play my recorder in assembly.I looked after a new girl.My class talked and wrote about the Domesday Book.At playtime I had salt and vinegar crisps. I went on the computer,we played Granny's Garden.We did Maths and singing.I walked home for my dinner of bacon and potatoes.I did Topic before we went swimmimg.(age10).
